msDesc.head: Cyril of Jerusalem, Nikolaos Cabasilas, (Niketas) Neilos of Rhodes.

msItem.note: BHG 1076zm, inc. mut. ἡμῖν ἐξεγένετο … des. mut. τὰ δὲ νῦν, τέλος μὲν (= PG 147, 992C-993)

msItem.author: Cyril of Jerusalem
msItem.title: Catecheses Ad illuminandos
msItem.note: CPG 3585: i) fols 3r-6v: Catech. 1; ii) fols 6v-17r: Catech. 2; iii) fols 17r-25v: Catech. 3; iv) fols 25v-41r: Catech. 4; v) fols 41v-48v: Catech. 5; vi) fols 48v-66r: Catech. 6; vii) fols 66r-72v: Catech. 7; viii) fols 73r-75v: Catech. 8; ix) fols 76r-83r: Catech. 9; x) fols 83r-93r: Catech. 10; xi) fols 93r-103v: Catech. 11; xii) fols 103v-121v: Catech. 12; xiii) fols 121v-145r: Catech. 13; xiv) fols 145v-166v: Catech. 14; xv) fols 166v-191r: Catech. 15; xvi) fols 191v-214v: Catech. 16; xvii) fols 214v-244v: Catech. 17; xviii) fols 245r-272v: Catech. 18, eds W.C. Reischl and J. Rupp, Cyrilli Hierosolymorum archiepiscopi opera quae supersunt omnia, 2 vols., Munich, vol. 1, 1848; vol. 2, 1860 (repr. Hildesheim 1967), vol. 1, pp. 28–320; vol. 2, pp. 2–342.

msItem.author: Cyril of Jerusalem
msItem.title: Epistula ad Constantium imperatorem
msItem.note: CPG 3587, BHG 413, ed. E. Bihain, "L'épître de Cyrille de Jérusalem à Constance sur la vision de la Croix," Byzantion 43 (1973) 286–291.
The Evlogetaria for the departed, Nekrosima, Horologion 237–238.
BHG 1076 zm, inc. mut. ὁδός. Πρὸς ὃ καὶ τ’ἆλλα φέρεται. PG 147, 989Β-1016.

msItem.author: Nikolaos Cabasilas
msItem.title: Sermo in salvificam et vivificam Passionem Domini
msItem.note: BHG 414g, ed. B. Pseutogkas, Νικολάου Καβάσιλα ἑπτὰ ἀνέκδοτοι λόγοι τὸ πρῶτον νῦν ἐκδιδόμενοι. Εἰσαγωγή, κείμενον, σχόλια, Thessaloniki, 1976, pp. 92–112.

msItem.author: Nikolaos Cabasilas
msItem.title: Sermo in Ascensionem Domini
msItem.note: ed. B. Pseutogkas, Νικολάου Καβάσιλα ἑπτὰ ἀνέκδοτοι λόγοι τὸ πρῶτον νῦν ἐκδιδόμενοι. Εἰσαγωγή, κείμενον, σχόλια, Thessaloniki, 1976, pp. 113–123.
BHG 1147n, des. mut. ἀλλὰ τὸν ἡλίου δίσκον ἔ<λαχε μόνον … ed. M. Jugie, Homélies mariales byzantines II [Patrologia Orientalis 19, fasc. 3. Paris 1926, pp. 495–501.1.

msItem.author: (Niketas) Neilos of Rhodes
msItem.title: Homilia de Hypapante
msItem.note: BHG 1950k, tit. Νείλου τοῦ πανιεροτάτου μητροπολίτου ῥόδου· λόγος εἰς τὴν ὑπαπαντὴν τοῦ κυρίου καὶ θεοῦ καὶ σωτῆρος ἡμῶν ἰησοῦ χριστοῦ. inc. Ἔπεισί μοι μετὰ Παύλου … des. σὺν τοῖς ἄνωθεν εὐηρεστηκόσιν αὐτῶ δόξης τε καὶ λαμπρότητος· ὅτι αὐτῶ πρέπει ... ἀμήν; unpublished; for some extracts see A. Panagiotou, Νικήτας Μυρσινιώτης εἶτα Νεῖλος μητροπολίτης Ρόδου. Βίος καὶ ἔργον, Athens 1995, unpublished PhD thesis, pp. 106–107.

msItem.author: (Niketas) Neilos of Rhodes (τοῦ αὐτοῦ MS)
msItem.title: Homilia on the parable of the prodigal son
msItem.note: tit. ὁμιλία εἰς τὴν παραβολὴν. τοῦ ἀσώτου, ed. D. Moniou, Οἱ Ὁμιλίες τοῦ Νείλου Μητροπολίτου Ρόδου. Μία προσέγγιση στὴν ὕστερη βυζαντινὴ ἐκκλησιαστικὴ ρητορική, Athens 2010, pp. 147–179.

msItem.author: Nikolaos Cabasilas (τοῦ αὐτοῦ MS)
msItem.title: Liturgiae expositio
msItem.note: eds R. Bornert, J. Gouillard, P. Périchon, and S. Salaville, Nicolas Cabasilas, Explication de la divine liturgie, Sources chrétiennes 4 bis. Paris 1967, pp. 56–307.

msItem.author: (Niketas) Neilos of Rhodes (τοῦ αὐτοῦ MS)
msItem.title: Sermon on the Second coming
msItem.note: tit. λόγος εἰς τὴν εὐαγγελικὴν περικοπὴν ἥτις περὶ τῆς δευτέρας τοῦ Κυρίου παρουσίας διαλαμβάνει καὶ τῇ τῆς Ἀπόκρεω Κυριακῇ ἐπεκράτησεν ἀναγινώσκεσθαι, ed. D. Moniou, Οἱ Ὁμιλίες τοῦ Νείλου Μητροπολίτου Ρόδου. Μία προσέγγιση στὴν ὕστερη βυζαντινὴ ἐκκλησιαστικὴ ρητορική, Athens 2010, pp. 181–234.

msItem.author: (Niketas) Neilos of Rhodes
msItem.title: On the creation of the world
msItem.note: Τοῦ αυτοῦ λόγος περὶ τοῦ κόσμου γενέσεως καὶ τῆς τοῦ ἀνθρώπου δημιουργίας παραβάσεώς τε καὶ τῆς ἐκ τοῦ παραδείσου τῶν πρωτοπλάστων ἐκπτώσεως, inc. Ἐπὶ θύραις ἡμῖν ἤδη τῶν νηστειῶν ὁ καιρός ... des. πρὸς τὸ ἁμαρτάνειν ῥοπῆς, λαμβανούσης τὴν στάσιν; unpublished; for some extracts, see A. Panagiotou, Νικήτας Μυρσινιώτης εἶτα Νεῖλος μητροπολίτης Ρόδου. Βίος καὶ ἔργον, Athens 1995, unpublished PhD thesis, pp. 110–111.
Blank folios: 1v-2v; 40r-40v; 279r-280v; 315v-317v; 436r-439v; 440–441 (end leaves). MS. Holk. Gr. 70 was the last part of this manuscript.

handDesc.handNote: Various hands including (fols. 1–2, 281–94, 408–16) Γεώργιος Εὐγενικός, RGK 1. 62, PLP 91878.

binding.p: Typical Holkham binding of brown leather, with Coke family ostrich crest in gilt in the centre of the upper cover; Date: early nineteenth century. Rebound by John Jones of Liverpool (worked for Holkham 1816–1823. The spine lettered in gilt: / CYRILLI/CATECHESES/ GR.–//M.S./ SÆC. XV. / ; in pasted black leather: MS. /HOLKHAM/ Gr. / 32.

history.provenance: Ownership Notes: fol. 3r (top in grey ink): ἐκ τῶν μάρκου ἱερέως τοῦ μορζήνου

Old Catalogue Nrs: fol. ir Holkham Cat. No. 68/56 C2 A14 (in pencil); fol. 3r (upper right corner): ΙΓον (in brownish ink); handwritten note in black ink by B. de Montfaucon: 1698. codex. num. 1(9)/ Cyrilli Ieroso/ Catecheses/ annorum circ./ 250; fol. 295r: handwritten note in black ink by B. de Montfaucon: Anno 1698./ Nicolai Cabasila/ Sermones Anno-/rum circiter 250. Morezenos 13. Giustiniani 19. Olim Holkham Hall, Libr. of the Earl of Leicester, 56.

recordHist.source: Description by Dimitrios Skrekas (2018), with the support of the Leventis Foundation, the Oxford Centre for Byzantine Research, the Yerolemou Trust and the Michael Marks Charitable Trust.

ref.title: Pinakes | Πίνακες: Textes et manuscrits grecs

revisionDesc.change: Record fully revised: new description by Dimitris Skrekas.
